Super cute indeed. time to kill em

wait, you actually fell for that?
Plasma, I have no idea why it broke (it works on my computer lol); taking a look now
it was in the 31 stage, if you picked that path first you wouldnt even see the rest
verve said it was some Pre/Post-Draw shenanigans
oh right, i completely forgot the troller was involved lmao
do you use my upscale methord for this?
yeah, the shader uses post draw. then i re draw the app surface centred in the screen afterwards
yeah all these stages in 31 are by guests
this whole timemachine pick is a guest area
the sign at the start wasn't a lie
first one u did was echomask iirc
echo misunderstood the task and thought he was only allowed to use the stuff in the engine which ive provided + not that well with coding

that got a heart increase outta me
i was a bit sceptical first for trollex in a game like this, this area goes more on meme-y than experience, but i think its abstract so that counts
